recipe.title: Pumpkin Chocolate Chip Baked Oatmeal Cups Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: 2 ½ cups ; quick oat, or large oat ; (250 g)
½ cup ; chocolate chips, optional ; (85 g)

steps.step: In a bowl, add the milk, egg, honey, pumpkin puree, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla until combined.
Stir in the oats and chocolate chips.
Transfer the oat mixture to 15 silicone muffin cups, or a muffin tin lined with cupcake liners.
Bake for 30 minutes, until light golden on top.
Store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days, or in the freezer for up to 3 months.

steps_updated.steps_updated: In a bowl, add the milk, egg, honey, pumpkin puree, cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla until combined.
Stir in the oats and chocolate chips.
Transfer the oat mixture to 15 silicone muffin cups, or a muffin tin lined with cupcake liners.
Bake for 30 minutes, until light golden on top.
Store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days, or in the freezer for up to 3 months.
